sentence: A big part of this play is that Kinzinger, along with neo-conservatives like Rep. Liz Cheney, are battling to regain control over a political party now inundated with more flagrantly corrupt, more flagrantly authoritarian, and more flagrantly incompetent officials like Sen. Josh Hawley and Reps. Madison Cawthorn, Lauren Boebert, and Paul Gosar ascending to prominence.
title: Adam Kinzinger has a lot to say: Donald Trump is the worst president the U.S. ever had'

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn and Sen. Rand Paul endorsed Starbuck before Trump and pressed back on Trump's endorsement.
author: Christopher Hutton

sentence: North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R) on the House floor on Monday said Democrats had declared a war on biology? in supporting the rights of transgender Americans, adding that the party's left-wing movement is forcing children to endure radical expressions of sexuality.? Florida Gov.
author: Brooke Migdon | April 4
title: Rep. Boebert says children should wait until 21 to make life-altering' decisions about gender and sexuality
